title: Happy Holidays all =D
body:
https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-VWBNndM6WSA/WDNV6JlOeHI/AAAAAAAA__Y/bXMZp07c9iYcZp4j9zVxXG0PuR-NOrHegCLcB/s1600/Braum_Splash_10.jpg

I'm glad that you're all around to discuss and enjoy League with together =D Even though we may sometimes disagree on what champion may be OP, or what the game needs to truly stand the test of time. I hope we can continue to talk about epic plays, gameplay balance and the future of League in 2017.

I hope you all have a great holiday period filled with family, friends and LoL! Happy Snowdown!

Check out this thread if you're feeling generous this season - http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/Qd5clEbX-secret-santa

Here's a throw back to the old days - credit to [DntEatYellwSnw
](http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=1638747)

Twas the night before Snowdown, when all through the land
Not a champion was fighting, though a battle was planned
The potions were bought by a snowy drift
As a voice called out, Welcome to Summoner’s Rift

At bottom went Sona, followed by Vayne
Ready to last hit, while causing some pain
They hid in the jungle, to guard the wraiths
For, in their jungler, they needed great faith

By blue buff there stood, both top and mid
Little did they know, that’s where Shaco hid
Being sneaky, getting prepared to steal
Blue buff his goal, but ready to kill

That voice then called, on minions to spawn
As the battle commenced, each a summoner pawn
Ahri did leash, and Garen helped too
While Shaco prepared, to smite steal blue

He blinked and he stealthed, at the same time
Invading the camp, being quite sublime
He laid down his smite, stole the Blue
Whilst back stabbing Riven, getting first blood too

As he ran, he cackled out taunts and jeers
Sprinting away, as his boxes did fear
Twas not the greatest, of starts for my team
Though this fight was not over, for revenge I did scream

I respawned and bounded back to the fray
With ganks, and mias, I redeem myself today
I ran to my red buff, hands sweaty and shaking
Did he steal this as well? Ripe for the taking?

I breathed a sigh, deep with relief
Red Buff still stood, no sign of the Jester thief
Yet, I felt a twinge, a burning intuition
So I laid down my ward, and got into position

Lo and behold, Shaco came running
Still I did stand, silent and cunning
He began to steal red buff, quite unawares
At the right moment, I caught him unprepared

Thus I stole Red back, whilst gaining the Blue
I held my hands high, grabbing gold and xp too
Now it was time to finish my route
Followed by mid gank, while hopping about

I helped Ahri, to kill their mid Brand
This is where it starts, we take our stand
I strolled down to bot lane, and pinged their support
Flashed In and stunned him, their plan I did thwart

Then came Sona, followed by Vayne
Pinning and shooting, Ali’s life did drain
And Caitlyn tried, her best to survive
But at full health, we decided to dive

This netted, a Vayne double kill
GJ’s and TY’s, were given as goodwill
And so our Vayne, got quite the lead
“GG, noob bot” their top lane decreed

As the game approached 20 minutes
A surrender vote, the enemy submitted
It passed unanimous, 5 votes to none
The nexus exploded, we had finally won

And so goes the tale, of a battle before Snowdown
Where enemies battle, in a final showdown
Don’t ever despair, no matter what the odds
And pray for victory, to the matchmaking Gods
